title: A small tweak to MF
body:
So with MF minor VU coming up...could you guys give her some gameplay tweaks? something quite silly....

changer her passive to be her impure shots (W) passive, and strut become the new passive of her w....and her active becomes a small ms boost/as/grievous wounds.

replies.body:
They already said MF is getting a bit of a gameplay update.

Its not going to be Sion level update, but think Ashe level update. You know one ability is reworked heavily and the rest is just shifted around to make more sense.
